description:
Hoody simplicity and comfort – with iconic Covert performance – this is a warm, comfortable pullover for cold days on the trail and at camp. It delivers the thermal performance of our Alpenex™ II heathered fleece. Made from 100% recycled polyester, it’s soft, holds the heat, and has heathered knit that gives it the textured look of wool. The hood adds another layer of warmth, and a laminated pocket secures small essentials – and gives it iconic Covert style.

The Covert Pullover Hoody was previously the Covert Hoody.
name: Arcteryx Covert Pullover Hoody - Mens

specs.value: Alpenex II™ - 100% Recycled Polyester - bluesign Approved Material
